mapper.insert: insert ignore into ustv_detail(id, name, img, intro, hrefs, size, time, createtime, updatetime) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{img}, #{intro}, #{hrefs}, #{size}, #{time}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime});
mapper.select: select * from ustv_detail order by time desc limit 20 offset #{offset};
select * from ustv_detail where name like #{key} order by time desc;
